public class A
{
   public A(final String str1, final String str2)
   {
      
   }
   
   private A[] methodA(final String str1, final String str2)
      {
         return new A[]
         {
            new A(str1, str2)
            {
               //initialiser!
               {
                  methodA("1", "2");
               }
            },
            new A("hello".c) //<--------code complete to "hello".concat()
         };
      
      }
}
